channel.title: DreamScape [PI] HP issue
channel.description: In DreamScape source, the hp is messed up. It flicks to like 1 hp when in combat. Example: i have 99 hp, but when in combat and my hp goes lower, it becomes say.. 33/1 hp and then it'll flick back up to 33/99 hp. I hope this makes sense. Its a little hard to explain, but how can this be fixed?

item.title: DreamScape [PI] HP issue
item.dc:creator: @h3rbl0re h3rbl0re
item.description:
@h3rbl0re wrote:

In DreamScape source, the hp is messed up. It flicks to like 1 hp when in combat. Example: i have 99 hp, but when in combat and my hp goes lower, it becomes say… 33/1 hp and then it’ll flick back up to 33/99 hp. I hope this makes sense. Its a little hard to explain, but how can this be fixed?

Read full topic
